languages.text: "Владайм, Владайм, Владайм... какие ажи вложили в твои уста столь злые слова? Ты говоришь словно имперский чинуша, а не как один из нас". {n}Стоящая к вам спиной женщина патетически вздыхает, после чего ее тон резко меняется.{/n} "Где мой груз, Владайм? У Фалько, верно? Так ты теперь ведешь дела со старыми друзьями?"

traits.locale_text: "Владайм, Владайм, Владайм... какие дивы вложили в твои уста столь злые слова? Ты говоришь словно имперский чинуша, а не как один из нас". {n}Стоящая к вам спиной женщина патетически вздыхает, после чего ее тон резко меняется.{/n} "Где мой груз, Владайм? У Фалько, верно? Так ты теперь ведешь дела со старыми друзьями?"

languages.text: "Vladaym, Vladaym, Vladaym... What azhi put such harsh words into your mouth? You talk like you're an Imperial clerk, not one of us." {n}The woman, who is standing with her back to you, lets out an ostentatious sigh, then her tone changes dramatically.{/n} "Where's my cargo, Vladaym? Falco has it, doesn't he? So that's how you do business with your old friends these days?"
languages.original_text: "Владайм, Владайм, Владайм... какие ажи вложили в твои уста столь злые слова? Ты говоришь словно имперский чинуша, а не как один из нас". {n}Стоящая к вам спиной женщина патетически вздыхает, после чего ее тон резко меняется.{/n} "Где мой груз, Владайм? У Фалько, верно? Так ты теперь ведешь дела со старыми друзьями?"

You talk like you're an Imperial clerk, not one of us." {n}The woman, who is standing with her back to you, lets out an ostentatious sigh, then her tone changes dramatically.{/n} "Where's my cargo, Vladaym? Falco has it, doesn't he? So that's how you do business with your old friends these days?"

languages.text: 「ちょっと、ヴラダイム…随分とひどい事を言うね？まるで帝国職員のような口ぶりじゃないか」{n}こちらに背を向けて立つ女は、わざとらしくため息を吐き、ガラリと声のトーンを変える。{/n}「アタシの貨物はどこ、ヴラダイム？ファルコが持っているんだろ？あっそ、最近のアンタは、昔馴染みにこういう仕事のやり方をするわけだ？」
languages.original_text: "Vladaym, Vladaym, Vladaym... What azhi put such harsh words into your mouth? You talk like you're an Imperial clerk, not one of us." {n}The woman, who is standing with her back to you, lets out an ostentatious sigh, then her tone changes dramatically.{/n} "Where's my cargo, Vladaym? Falco has it, doesn't he? So that's how you do business with your old friends these days?"

traits.locale_text: 「ちょっと、ヴラダイム…随分とひどい事を言うね？まるで帝国職員のような口ぶりじゃないか」{n}こちらに背を向けて立つ女は、わざとらしくため息を吐き、ガラリと声のトーンを変える。{/n}「アタシの貨物はどこ、ヴラダイム？ファルコが持っているんだろ？あっそ、最近のアンタは、昔馴染みにこういう仕事のやり方をするわけだ？」

languages.text: “弗拉迪姆，弗拉迪姆，弗拉迪姆……到底是什么鬼怪，让你吐出了这么难听的话？你说话的口气就像帝国文员，不像我们之中的一员。”{n}背对着你的女人发出了响亮的叹息。随后，她的语气发生了戏剧性的变化。{/n}“那我的那批货去哪了，弗拉迪姆？落到了法尔科手里，对不对？你现在就是这样和你的老朋友做生意的吗？”
languages.original_text: "Vladaym, Vladaym, Vladaym... What azhi put such harsh words into your mouth? You talk like you're an Imperial clerk, not one of us." {n}The woman, who is standing with her back to you, lets out an ostentatious sigh, then her tone changes dramatically.{/n} "Where's my cargo, Vladaym? Falco has it, doesn't he? So that's how you do business with your old friends these days?"

traits.locale_text: “弗拉迪姆，弗拉迪姆，弗拉迪姆……到底是什么鬼怪，让你吐出了这么难听的话？你说话的口气就像帝国文员，不像我们之中的一员。”{n}背对着你的女人发出了响亮的叹息。随后，她的语气发生了戏剧性的变化。{/n}“那我的那批货去哪了，弗拉迪姆？落到了法尔科手里，对不对？你现在就是这样和你的老朋友做生意的吗？”

languages.text: «Vladaym, Vladaym, Vladaym... ¿Qué azhi te ha inculcado esas palabrejas? Hablas como un fantoche del Imperium, no como uno de los nuestros». {n}La mujer, que te da la espalda, suelta un ostentoso suspiro y cambia el tono drásticamente.{/n} «¿Dónde está mi cargamento, Vladaym? Lo tiene Falco, ¿a que sí? ¿Así haces negocios ahora con tus viejos amigos?».
languages.original_text: "Vladaym, Vladaym, Vladaym... What azhi put such harsh words into your mouth? You talk like you're an Imperial clerk, not one of us." {n}The woman, who is standing with her back to you, lets out an ostentatious sigh, then her tone changes dramatically.{/n} "Where's my cargo, Vladaym? Falco has it, doesn't he? So that's how you do business with your old friends these days?"

traits.locale_text: «Vladaym, Vladaym, Vladaym... ¿Qué azhi te ha inculcado esas palabrejas? Hablas como un fantoche del Imperium, no como uno de los nuestros». {n}La mujer, que te da la espalda, suelta un ostentoso suspiro y cambia el tono drásticamente.{/n} «¿Dónde está mi cargamento, Vladaym? Lo tiene Falco, ¿a que sí? ¿Así haces negocios ahora con tus viejos amigos?».

languages.text: « Vladaym, Vladaym, Vladaym... Quel azhi vous fait parler aussi sévèrement ? On croirait entendre un agent impérial, plutôt que l'un d'entre nous. » {n}La femme, qui vous tourne le dos, pousse un soupir exagéré avant de changer radicalement de ton :{/n} « Où sont mes marchandises, Vladaym ? C'est Falco qui les a, n'est-ce pas ? Alors, c'est comme ça que vous conduisez vos affaires avec vos amis, maintenant ? »
languages.original_text: "Vladaym, Vladaym, Vladaym... What azhi put such harsh words into your mouth? You talk like you're an Imperial clerk, not one of us." {n}The woman, who is standing with her back to you, lets out an ostentatious sigh, then her tone changes dramatically.{/n} "Where's my cargo, Vladaym? Falco has it, doesn't he? So that's how you do business with your old friends these days?"

traits.locale_text: « Vladaym, Vladaym, Vladaym... Quel azhi vous fait parler aussi sévèrement ? On croirait entendre un agent impérial, plutôt que l'un d'entre nous. » {n}La femme, qui vous tourne le dos, pousse un soupir exagéré avant de changer radicalement de ton :{/n} « Où sont mes marchandises, Vladaym ? C'est Falco qui les a, n'est-ce pas ? Alors, c'est comme ça que vous conduisez vos affaires avec vos amis, maintenant ? »

languages.text: "Vladaym, Vladaym, Vladaym ... Welcher Azhi hat Euch denn so rüde Worte in den Mund gelegt? Ihr sprecht wie ein imperialer Beamter, nicht wie einer von uns." {n}Die Frau, die mit dem Rücken zu dir steht, seufzt demonstrativ und ändert dann radikal den Tonfall.{/n} "Wo ist meine Fracht, Vladaym? Falco hat sie, stimmt's? Macht ihr jetzt so Geschäfte mit Euren alten Freunden?"
languages.original_text: "Vladaym, Vladaym, Vladaym... What azhi put such harsh words into your mouth? You talk like you're an Imperial clerk, not one of us." {n}The woman, who is standing with her back to you, lets out an ostentatious sigh, then her tone changes dramatically.{/n} "Where's my cargo, Vladaym? Falco has it, doesn't he? So that's how you do business with your old friends these days?"

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym, Vladaym, Vladaym ... Welcher Azhi hat Euch denn so rüde Worte in den Mund gelegt? Ihr sprecht wie ein imperialer Beamter, nicht wie einer von uns." {n}Die Frau, die mit dem Rücken zu dir steht, seufzt demonstrativ und ändert dann radikal den Tonfall.{/n} "Wo ist meine Fracht, Vladaym? Falco hat sie, stimmt's? Macht ihr jetzt so Geschäfte mit Euren alten Freunden?"

languages.text: "Vladaym, Vladaym... Bu kırıcı sözleri hangi azhiden öğrendin bilmem ama bizden biri değil de İmparatorluk kâtibiymiş gibi konuşuyorsun." {n}Sırtı sana dönük duran kadın, abartılı bir iç çektikten sonra sesi çarpıcı biçimde değişiyor.{/n} "Kargom nerede Vladaym? Falco'da, değil mi? Eski dostlarınla böyle mi iş yapıyorsun artık?"
languages.original_text: "Vladaym, Vladaym, Vladaym... What azhi put such harsh words into your mouth? You talk like you're an Imperial clerk, not one of us." {n}The woman, who is standing with her back to you, lets out an ostentatious sigh, then her tone changes dramatically.{/n} "Where's my cargo, Vladaym? Falco has it, doesn't he? So that's how you do business with your old friends these days?"

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym, Vladaym, Vladaym... Bu kırıcı sözleri hangi azhiden öğrendin bilmiyorum ama bizden biri değil de İmparatorluk kâtibiymiş gibi konuşuyorsun." {n}Sırtı sana dönük duran kadının sesi, fiyakalı bir iç çektikten sonra dramatik bir değişikliğe uğruyor.{/n} "Kargom nerede Vladaym? Falco'da, değil mi? Eski dostlarına da böyle mi davranıyorsun artık?"
